<h3 id="X13975">X(13975)&nbsp;=&nbsp;ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 4th TRI-SQUARES-CENTRAL TO 3rd EXTOUCH</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*a^4+(b+c)*a^3-(3*b^2+2*b*c+3*c^2)*a^2-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a+(b^2-c^2)^2+4*S*a^2  :  :  <p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(4)</p>
<p>X(13975) lies on these lines: {1,13935}, {2,1703}, {3,13936}, {4,13947}, {6,6684}, {10,372}, {40,3069}, {46,13963}, {65,13958}, {140,8983}, {165,1588}, {355,6398}, {371,10164}, {485,3634}, {486,516}, {515,1152}, {517,13966}, {615,946}, {962,13941}, {1125,5420}, {1210,5414}, {1335,3911}, {1377,5745}, {1587,1698}, {1686,6685}, {1702,7586}, {1836,13954}, {1902,13937}, {2362,13411}, {2800,13991}, {2802,13977}, {3070,10175}, {3312,13883}, {3523,9583}, {3524,9615}, {3579,7584}, {3594,13911}, {3817,10577}, {4297,6396}, {5119,13962}, {5405,6213}, {5587,6460}, {5812,13953}, {5840,13976}, {6001,13980}, {6361,13939}, {6561,12512}, {7581,13893}, {7582,9616}, {7583,11231}, {7968,11362}, {7969,10165}, {7982,13959}, {7991,13942}, {9911,13943}, {10306,13940}, {12197,13938}, {12458,13944}, {12459,13945}, {12497,13946}, {12696,13948}, {12697,13949}, {12698,13950}, {12699,13951}, {12700,13952}, {12701,13955}, {12702,13961}, {12703,13964}, {12704,13965}</p>
<p>
X(13975) = midpoint of X(1152) and X(13973)<br>
X(13975) = reflection of X(13971) in X(13966)<br>X(13975) = {X(6), X(6684)}-harmonic conjugate of X(13912)<br></p>
